content:
The Ministry of Justice and the US Ministry of Commerce Strengthen export control to prevent Russia's access to technologies used in drones and missiles used against Ukraine.

This is stated inmessageUS Embassies in Ukraine.

According to the US Ambassador to Ukraine Bridget Brink, support Ukraine's ability to win the war against Russia is the work of the entire US government.

As the Armyinform reported, Bridget Bridk recentlymade a statementOn the continuation of Russia's barbaric blows on the energy infrastructure of Ukraine.
title: USA will strengthen Russia's creation of rockets and drones by Russia
description: This is stated in the US Embassy in Ukraine. According to the US Ambassador to Ukraine ...
author: Army Inform
